entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023
